Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This product is truly a masterpiece, offering unparalleled features and benefits that set it apart from the rest. Given its exceptional value and unique capabilities, we believe it would be an excellent addition to your collection or business. We're extending this exclusive opportunity to you with a special offer of $15000. This price reflects not only the cost of production and materials but also the time, effort, and innovation that went into creating this masterpiece. We're confident that you'll find immense value in this product, and we look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $15,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $15,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $10,000
